functions.tag: {CustomModelData:3,SpawnEntities:[[{Tags:[Global,Neutrality,Blow,PassingTree,Main,SpawnParticles],Level:200}]],display:{Name:'{"translate":"世界樹の剣","color":"dark_green","bold":true,"italic":false}',Lore:['[{"text":"❖ ","color":"light_purple","italic":false},{"translate":"%1$s%2$s(V)","color":"white","with":[{"translate":"精霊の"},{"translate":"刻印"}]}]','{"translate":"大いなる生命力を宿した剣。","color":"green","italic":false}','{"translate":"捨てることで通りすがりの木を","color":"green","italic":false}','{"translate":"生やすことができる。","color":"green","italic":false}','[{"text":"","color":"white","italic":false},{"text":"C","font":"icon","color":"light_purple"},{"text":" HPMP割合回復"}]','{"text":"---TUSBMemory---","obfuscated":true,"color":"gray","italic":false}']},Engraving:{EnchantID:"精霊",Tier:5},Skill:{Type:"TUSBMemory",Initializing:1b,Job:"共通",Name:"HPMP割合回復",Level:1,Interval:100,Trigger:"近接攻撃する",Count:64},AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Name:"カスタム",Amount:62d,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,0,40],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Name:"カスタム",Amount:-2.4d,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,0,50],Slot:"mainhand"}]}
